     400             : 
     401             : // A stream listener interposed between the nsInputStreamPump used for intercepted channels
     402             : // and this channel's original listener. This is only used to ensure the original listener
     403             : // sees the channel as the request object, and to synthesize OnStatus and OnProgress notifications.
     404             : class InterceptStreamListener : public nsIStreamListener
     405             :                               , public nsIProgressEventSink
